SEARCH
Package library.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
library.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class serves as a mediator between the application services and the user interface. It provides methods to perform operations related to users, librarians, books, borrowings.

  • Constructor Summary

    • Controller

      public Controller(UserService userService, LibrarianService librarianService, BookService bookService, BorrowingService borrowingService)
      Constructs a Controller with the specified services.
      Parameters:
      userService - the service to manage user-related operations
      librarianService - the service to manage librarian-related operations
      bookService - the service to manage book-related operations
      borrowingService - the service to manage borrowing-related operations

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      Creates a new user in the system.

    • createLibrarian

      public void createLibrarian(UserForLibrarianDto dto, LocalDate employmentDate, String position)
      Creates a new librarian in the system.
      Parameters:
      dto - the UserForLibrarianDto containing user details
      employmentDate - the employment date of the librarian
      position - the position of the librarian
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the employment date is in the future

      public List<BorrowingDto> getAllBorrowingsForUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves all borrowing records for a specific user based on their email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user whose borrowing records are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of BorrowingDto objects representing the user's borrowing records

      Checks if a user is a librarian by their email.

      Returns:

      public BookForLibrarianDto getBookForLibrarianDtoByIsbn(String isbn)
      Retrieves a BookForLibrarianDto by its ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a BookForLibrarianDto object containing the book's details for the librarian view.

      Returns:
      a UserForLibrarianDto object containing the user's details for the librarian view.

    • getLibrarianByEmail

      public Librarian getLibrarianByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a Librarian by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the librarian to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a Librarian object containing the librarian's details.

    • updateLibrarian

      public void updateLibrarian(UserForLibrarianDto dto, String position, LocalDate empDate)
      Updates the details of a librarian.
      Parameters:
      dto - the UserForLibrarianDto containing the updated user details for the librarian.
      position - the updated position of the librarian.
      empDate - the updated employment date of the librarian.
